attributes.action: Toughen laws on HGV drivers using mobile devices while driving
attributes.additional_details: The law must be changed. How many more need to be innocently damaged or lose their lives - how many families will be torn apart? Please sign
attributes.background: Many people have lost their lives as a result of HGV drivers using Mobile devices while driving. 200 Britons in the last 10 years on UK roads have died, how many others did as well?  I see this daily - we all do!

rejection.details: Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action. You could start a new petition explaining clearly what specific change you would like Parliament to make to the law.
